text: The Colombian Community and Communal Political Movement (Movimiento Politico Communal y Comunidad Colombiano) is a populist and civic political party in Colombia. At the last legislative elections, 10 March 2002, the party won as one of the many small parties parliamentary representation. In the election of 2006, the party won no seats. Category:Political parties in Colombia
title: Colombian Community and Communal Political Movement
